# GET /v1/ciBuildRuns/{id}/relationships/builds | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/ciBuildRuns/{id}/relationships/builds ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-cibuildruns-_id_-relationships-builds)

-  GET /v1/ciBuildRuns/{id}/relationships/builds 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/ciBuildRuns/{id}/relationships/builds

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-cibuildruns-_id_-relationships-builds#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/ciBuildRuns/{id}/relationships/builds
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-cibuildruns-_id_-relationships-builds#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-cibuildruns-_id_-relationships-builds#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-cibuildruns-_id_-relationships-builds#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[CiBuildRunBuildsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/cibuildrunbuildslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-cibuildruns-_id_-relationships-builds#see-also)

### [Getting Build Information](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-cibuildruns-_id_-relationships-builds#Getting-Build-Information)

[`Read Xcode Cloud Build Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-cibuildruns-_id_)Get information about a specific Xcode Cloud build.[`List All Actions for an Xcode Cloud Build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-cibuildruns-_id_-actions)List all actions Xcode Cloud performed during a specific build.[`List All Builds Xcode Cloud Created in App Store Connect`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-cibuildruns-_id_-builds)List All App Store Connect and TestFlight Builds when it performed a build.[`GET /v1/ciBuildRuns/{id}/relationships/actions`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-cibuildruns-_id_-relationships-actions)
